block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$725,000 110 West 17th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,875-sq.-ft. floor-through condo in a prewar building; high ceilings, h/w floors, c/a, common roof deck; common charges $460; taxes $11,000; listed at $764,500, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$480,000 300 East 54th Street 2-bedroom 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; concierge, dining area, eat-in kitchen, den, balcony, 2 exposures, enclosed rooftop pool; maintenance $1,220, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $495,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$435,000 14 East Seventh Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; dining area, high ceilings, 2 exposures, common roof deck; maintenance $921, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $450,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: JSK Realty; Citi Habitats)

$3.8 million 200 East 61st Street (Savoy) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,400-sq.-ft. triplex penthouse condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, windowed eat-in kitchen, greenhouse, fireplace, 3 terraces; common charges $1,677; taxes $34,560; listed at $3.9 million, 16 weeks on market (Brokers: DG Neary Realty; Brown Harris Stevens)

$605,000 100 West 89th Street (Centra) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, eat-in kitchen, garden view, common roof deck, health club in building; common charges $626; taxes $4,548; listed at $610,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$194,000 437 Bolton Avenue 70-year-old 2-family detached house; 3 bedrooms, dining room in primary unit; 2 bedrooms in other; eat-in kitchen, 1 bath in each; 4-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,290; listed at $200,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Sandra Silverman Real Estate)

$275,000 750 Kappock Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr doormen, h/w floors, west exposure; maintenance $821, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $275,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$213,000 321 Clinton Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,210-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar building; dining area, 14-ft. ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, parquet floors; maintenance $378, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $230,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

$915,000 464 Eighth Street 2-family, 4-story brownstone; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, great room, kitchen with granite countertops, rear deck in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $995,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Rita Knox Real Estate)

$300,000 610 20th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old legal 2-family attached house to be used as a one-family residence; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 2-car garage, 18.7-by-117-ft. lot; taxes $1,491; listed at $300,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: John P. Burke)

$118,000 69-10 Yellowstone Boulevard (Mayflower) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors; maintenance $509, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $124,888, 2 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/ F.H. Realty)

$390,000 249-43 52nd Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 45-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen with skylight, renovated baths, finished basement, walk-in closet, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,269; listed at $399,800, 3 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$333,000 4 Adam Court 24-year-old 2-family detached ranch; 3 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, eat-in kitchen in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; 1-car garage, 44-by-96-ft. lot; taxes $2,253; listed at $379,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Vitali Sunshine)

3-bedroom, 3-bath, 80-year-old colonial; dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, open porch, attached 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $11,297; listed at $679,000, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: McMillan Severin Mitchelle & Constabile; Merritt Associates)

$291,500 3 Cooper Drive 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 40-year-old raised ranch; entry foyer, dining area, eat-in kitchen, deck, 2-car attached garage; 0.33-acre lot; taxes $7,460; listed at $297,500; 19 weeks on market (Brokers: Leonard Young; Houlihan/Lawrence)
3-bedroom, 1-bath, 50-year-old ranch; dining area, fireplace, attic, fenced yard, attached 1-car garage, 0.33-acre corner lot; taxes $5,638; listed at $429,000; 4 weeks on market (Broker: Merritt)

$312,000 18 Ria Drive 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 48-year-old ranch; entry hall, fireplace, dining area, deck, eat-in kitchen, full unfinished basement, attached 1-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $6,831; listed at $339,000; 16 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21 Wolff)

$1,337,500 34 Burning Tree Road 4-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 35-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, library, home office, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 3.16-acre lot; taxes $9,627; listed at $1.399 million, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Round Hill Partners)

$260,000 22 Olmstead Place 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 30-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, wood-burning stove, rear deck, 1-car garage, 0.13-acre lot; taxes $3,310; listed at $264,900, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Norwalk; Century 21/ Karnes)

$505,000 50 Tanners Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 34-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, screened porch, h/w floors, fireplace, two 2-car garages, 2-acre lot; taxes $5,755; listed at $539,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Realty Seven; William Raveis)

$225,000 405 Linden Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 79-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-184-ft. lot; taxes $3,200; listed at $225,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$160,000 195 East 23rd Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 38-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, basement, 1-car attached garage, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,000; listed at $164,500, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$240,000 7 Concord Lane 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 34-year-old high ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 1-car attached garage, deck, pool, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $5,000; listed at $249,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Homes America)

$550,000 6 Wolcott Drive 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 9-year-old colonial; family room, fireplace, full basement, 3-car garage, 1.92-acre wooded lot; taxes $9,955; listed at $579,900, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$105,000 1110 Sixth Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 45-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, full basement, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,205; listed at $99,000, (multiple bids) 4 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$969,000 119 Buck Haven Hill 6-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 9-year-old colonial; c/a, h/w floors, central vacuum, 3-car garage, 0.93 acre-lot; taxes $11,766; listed at $969,000, 3 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
